name: Azure Fundamentals Course - December Program #1
description:
REGISTRATION LINK : https://kisaurl.org/fundamentals19

To create your vision for tomorrow, you need to understand what the cloud can do for you and your company today. In this introductory course, Microsoft Azure Virtual Training Day: Fundamentals, you will learn about cloud computing concepts, models and services, covering topics such as public, private and hybrid cloud, as well as infrastructure as a service, platform as a service and software as a service.

name: Data Management for Certification - ONLINE - R9200.00 for 4 mornings
description:
Due to COVID-19 we have postponed the PIYP Exam event, and changed the Data Management for Certification to a 4 morning online course (9am to 1pm). This allows for lecture of the content heavy material in the morning, and scheduled on-on-one Q&A sessions with Howard and Veronica in the afternoons to ensure understanding, and to help with applying DMBOK knowledge to work.

description:
This is an online 1h meetup during lunch time. Let's get the meetups going again! We will have 2 exciting short talks this time.

12:00pm
Mary Clair Thompson
Academic Data Engineer from Duke University

Prefect as a Data Engineering Workflow Management Tool

Choosing a workflow management tool that suits a team’s current needs and projected future projects can be a difficult decision. Excellent options abound (NiFi, Airflow, etc), and every team’s use case is unique. In this talk, I will discuss

name: курс PYNN: Введение в Нейронные сети на Python
Scaling the new 2020 Scrum Guide
description:
Scaling the new 2020 Scrum Guide

The New 2020 Scrum Guide is Here!

Scrum turned 25 this month, and a new 2020 Scrum Guide has been released to commemorate the occasion.

Join us to learn about the key changes introduced by the new Scrum Guide and how it might impact your Agile organization.

In this session, we’ll cover:
• Key difference introduced by the new Scrum Guide
• How the differences may impact your organization.
• New elements to consider when scaling Scrum.

Join our three industry

name: Grakn Academy | Automated Reasoning with Rules
description:
Good for:
- Beginners to Grakn and Graql.
- Those who have been using Grakn and want a refresher on reasoning in Grakn.
- Experienced data analysts and software engineers.
- Those who want to better represent their domain in a model that allows for logical reasoning at the database level.

Description:
Grakn is capable of reasoning over data via pre-defined rules. Graql rules look for a given pattern in the dataset and when found, create the given queryable relation (only for the time being of t

name: Virtual Screening Week: "Coded Bias" Documentary, 12/7-12/13
description:
We're so honored to co-host this week-long virtual screening of "Coded Bias" to coincide with Computer Science Education Week.

CODED BIAS follows MIT Media Lab researcher Joy Buolamwini’s startling discovery that many facial recognition technologies fail more often on darker-skinned faces, and delves into an investigation of widespread bias in artificial intelligence.

Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jZl55PsfZJQ
NYT Review: https://www.nytimes.com/2020/11/11/movies/coded-bias-review.ht

name: VR and Experience Prototyping
description:
> Meet Laura Boffi
In our first Meetup, I will introduce you Laura Boffi, my favorite interaction and service designer.
She will speak about her VR project "Co-Drive". She will tell us the whys and the hows of her research and how she manages to gather the most meaningful insights to design VR applications.
Then you will be able to ask Laura questions or present your VR or Research related projects and challenges.

> A bit more about Laura
With a Bachelor degree in Industrial Design from Politec

name: CORTX Hackathon
description:
Dear StorageBeers,

Seagate® Lyve™ Labs is hosting a virtual hackathon on Dec. 7–10. Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to build integrations for CORTX™—a 100% open source object storage solution that enables efficient capture and consolidation of massive unstructured data sets. Approved integrations will be featured on the CORTX GitHub page.
Leverage cutting-edge technology to help organizations save more data and maximize the value of the data they already have.
